ModMetadata.Name: FPGA [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]FPGA[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://jixxed.github.io/StationeersMods/
[h3]ItemBasicFPGAChip[/h3] Simple FPGA-like chip with 64 input pins, 64 gates, and 64 lookup table values.
[h3]ItemKitBasicFPGAHousing[/h3] Kit to construct housings to hold FPGA chips.
[h3]StructureBasicFPGALogicHousing[/h3] Chip housing that allows full access to all inputs/outputs of FPGA chip. Requires get/getd/put/putd instructions from IC10 chips.
[h3]StructureBasicFPGAReaderHousing[/h3] Chip housing that allows connecting first 8 inputs to data network devices and outputs first 8 gate values as logic values. Can be connected to logic devices to automate calculations without IC10.
[h3]MotherboardFPGA[/h3] Motherboard that provides a form and text editor for FPGA configuration. Use a computer (not laptop) to import/export to FPGA chips in housings.
Check the stationpedia pages and editor motherboard for more details.
